entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming south 20 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:37 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:37 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
